Fairfield.Fairfield\u2013Vacaville station: Fairfield–Vacaville station is a train station in Fairfield, Solano County, California, which provides rail access for the communities of Fairfield and Vacaville. The station is served by Amtrak California's Capitol Corridor rail line as well as buses. Previously scheduled to be completed by August 2017 and incorporated into the Capitol Corridor schedule in October of that year, final testing delayed opening until a later date.
